episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_04: We can’t just sit by and watch this!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_05:
C’mon! Somebody’s gotta take a stand and fix
this nonsense...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_06: Ack! Hey! That guy just stole my present!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_07: Aw, thanks! I’m sure I’ll love it—
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_08: Wait... This has somebody else’s name on it.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_09:
Huh? That’s not the present I made for you!
How’d it get swapped?!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_11:
I really gave this chocolate-makin’ thing my
best shot and made ’em extra sweet...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_12: I sure hope they like it.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_13: Hah! Thanks for the chocolate, sucker!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_15:
We’re the Champions of Justice—out to save the
world from this twisted trash tradition you call
Palentine’s Day!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_17:
You’ll see! We’re going to wreck Palentine’s Day
for everyone!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4001_1001_18:
Hey! Where do you weirdos think you’re going
with those?!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_01: I thought I saw them run this way...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_02: Hey, Sis. I’ve been lookin’ for ya.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_04:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] said [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw you
earlier, so we all came to find you!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_05: I wanted to sing you a song for Palentine’s Day.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_06:
Aw, that sounds amazing! It’s just—I’m a little tied
up at the moment!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_07:
You haven’t seen any weirdos around here calling
themselves Team Heartbreak, have you?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_08: They stole the presents I made!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_09:
Then they prattled on about how they’re out
to wreck Palentine’s Day or somethin’!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_10: I put a lot of love into those presents...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_12:
So that’s what happened. Don’t worry, Sis.
No need to be sad.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_13:
’Cause your big bro’s gonna find those punks
and teach ’em a lesson!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_15:
Course I will. You lot don’t mind coming along,
do you?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_17:
Let’s split up and find ’em. Gloria and I’ll go
this way.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_18:
OK. [Name:PlayerNickname ], I’ll be with
you, then.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_19:
There’s no way I’m lettin’ those jerks keep my
Palentine’s Day presents!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_20:
Oh. You two seem a bit flustered. Is everything
all right?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_22:
Chocolate?! Who said anything about me sneaking
out to eat chocolate?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_23:
Huh? No, I was just saying someone’s stolen the
chocolate I made...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_26: Yeah... Hear me out, will ya?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_28:
You worked so hard to make that chocolate,
and they’ve gone and stolen it?! Unbelievable!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_29: I want to help you find them!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_31:
I’ll have to hold off on finding my own dessert
until this is resolved...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_32: Hm? Did you say something, Bea?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_33: Oh, it’s nothing! Don’t mind me!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4002_1001_34:
Let’s go catch Team Heartbreak and give them a
good scolding!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_03: Oh wow... Still as beautiful as ever.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_05:
You’re planning on stealing presents from those
two, aren’t ya!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_07:
Wait, I’ve got no idea what you’re talking
about, honest!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_08: You’re not a member of Team Heartbreak, then?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_09: What? Wh-who’s that? I may be in Team Break...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_10:
but I don’t know nothing about Team Heartbreak!
I swear!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_11:
The fact that you’re in Team Break makes you
rather suspicious.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_12:
Yeah. Why were you watching that sync
pair, anyway?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_13:
I was trying to figure out the best way to express
my thanks to them...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_14:
Y’see, they helped me out before, when I
was injured.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_15:
They didn’t run off at the sight of your Team
Break mask?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_16:
Well, I wasn’t wearing it when they saw
me. My mask broke when I got hurt.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_17:
I was a nasty mess, but they carried me all the
way back into town.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_18: It was such a beautiful gesture, y’know?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_19: I mean, I was completely awestruck!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_20:
Well, I guess that makes sense since they were
so kind to you...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_21:
I don’t know, I feel like any decent person would
have done the same.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_23: She’s the most angelic creature I’ve ever seen!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_25: Look at the way her mane flutters in the wind!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_27:
And those soft, red flames glowing with warmth
and kindness!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_28:
Uh...hang on. So when you said you were
awestruck, you meant...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_30:
I mean, who wouldn’t be over the moon after an
angel like that practically saves your life!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_32:
Well. That certainly wasn’t what I was expecting
to hear, but I suppose Palentine’s Day IS all about
showing thanks to those you care about.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_33:
True. It sounds like it was a pretty life-changing
moment for you.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_34:
I get why you’d want to give them a proper
thank-you!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_35:
But you need to stop worrying about it so much!
Just march over there and tell them how ya feel.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_36:
What if they get scared of me ’cause I’m in
Team Break...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_37:
Forget about Team Break for a minute, all right?
Just go over there and be yourself!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_38:
I agree. I think you should take off that mask,
walk up to them, and let them know how
thankful you are.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_39:
But...I’m in Team Break! I can’t just betray my
comrades like that!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_40: I do want to thank them, though...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_42:
Once you’re ready to say something to them,
come see me, all right?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4003_1001_44:
But if you get up to any trouble with Team Break,
I won’t be so nice.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4004_1001_03: Why don’t we try a different approach?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4004_1001_04:
Maybe instead of looking for them, we can get
them to come to us!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_01:
What? A Palentine’s Day battle featuring Leon
and Diantha?!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_02:
Yeah! After the battle, they’re even doing a
meet-and-greet with their fans!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_03:
Oh, I have to be there! I’d love to give Diantha
a present!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_05:
No, I can’t be thinking about that! I still have to
decide what to do!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_06: OK. I’ll see you later, then!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_09: C’mon, Ponyta! Let’s chase him away!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_12:
Weird. Why do I get the feeling that I’ve seen that
guy before?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_13: They saw me! But I got away somehow...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_14: But that look in Ponyta’s eyes...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_16:
And because of that, she let me go? Even though
she knew this time that I’m in Team Break?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_17: Why did I spend so much time worrying?!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4005_1001_18: I HAVE to tell them how thankful I am!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_01: The time to battle has come!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_02:
I’ve been wonderin’... Why’d you partner up
with Vanilluxe?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_03: It’s...to train myself to resist temptation.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_04:
I met Vanilluxe when I was training on a
snowy mountain.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_05:
I’ve been training myself to resist craving
sweets, even when faced with such a
yummy-looking Pokémon.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_06:
Could it be that you’ve got a bit of a
sweet too—
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_0302_10: It’s that guy from Team Break!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_12: So you’ve decided what you’re gonna do?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_13: Yeah... I have to be honest about my feelings.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_14: OK. All that’s left is to get them a present, then!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_16:
Uh...sure, I think makin’ some chocolates might
be nice...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_17: Chocolates! Yes, that’s an excellent choice!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_18: OK! Please help me make them!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4006_1001_20:
I can teach you how to make the sweetest
chocolates ever!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4007_1001_01: Hey! Could you two help me out again?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4007_1001_04:
Looks like the clothes I picked out match
you perfectly!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4007_1001_05: Thank you for your help, Serena.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4007_1001_06:
I was able to walk around town without
being recognized.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4007_1001_07:
Always happy to help! But honestly, look at how
cute you are!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4007_1001_09: All right! Let’s get started on these desserts!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4008_1001_01: You live up to your reputation, Champion Diantha!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4008_1001_02:
I’m also happy to face an opponent as fierce as
you, Leon!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4008_1001_03: Welp, looks like they’re gonna battle for real!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4008_1001_04:
Fine by me. If they’re enjoyin’ it, it’ll be a more
convincing ploy.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_01: *snort* Gimme a break. A Palentine’s battle?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_02:
We’re gonna steal all those presents from their
fans—down to the very last one!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_04:
We know you’re plannin’ on making a mess outta
this match, but we’re not gonna let you do that!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_05: Ugh! No need to deal with these brats! Let’s go!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_07:
Oh! You’re that guy who was injured that
one time...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_08: Hey! Aren’t you one of us?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_11: C’mon. We’ve got to help him!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_13:
Let’s wait for him to say what he’s gonna
say first. Just watch!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_14: What, so he’s, like, a traitor? Let’s punish him!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_15: I’ll have to ask you to refrain.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_16:
If you truly are that hungry for a battle, we’ll
take you on.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_17: I won’t let you lay a single finger on them!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_18:
Bwahahaha! Look at you! You’re so scared,
your legs are shaking!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_19:
Pull it together! You know what you wanna
say, right?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_20: Y-yeah! I have to say it!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_22: My cheers will really get you goin’!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_24: Well done! Leave the rest to us!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_26: How can they look like that yet be so strong?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_27:
Don’t let your guard down just ’cause we’re cute!
We’ll eat you right up!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4009_1001_28: My partner Mawile is fierce AND cute!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_01:
Our match got canceled, so we’ll have it another
day, huh.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_02:
Well, even if everything did go according to plan,
it’s a shame we couldn’t finish our battle.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_03: It was just getting exciting, too.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_05: Um... So you’re in Team Break?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_06:
Put that aside for now, and try to see the person
behind the mask.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_08: Um... Thank you for your help just now.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_09: No, I should be the one thanking you!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_10:
Thank you so much for helping me when I
was injured!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_11:
Given it’s Palentine’s Day and all, I wanted to do
something to thank you...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_12: Oh! So you made chocolates for me and Ponyta?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_13:
I’m sorry, but my Ponyta actually isn’t very fond
of sweets.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_15:
Ponyta’s...eating it? I’ve never seen her eat
something sweet with such gusto!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_17: I’m so glad she understands how I feel!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_18: Aww, why do they get to have all the fun?!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_20:
If ya want presents that bad, I’ll make ya some
chocolates, OK?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_23:
Yippee! Thanks! I promise I won’t do anything
bad ever again!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_25: Quickly moved are the hearts of fickle souls...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_26:
By the way, what happened to those presents you
stole from me?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_27:
Uh...sorry! I couldn’t help myself! They looked so
tasty that I ate ’em all up!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_31:
Actually, the presents they stole were supposed
to be for you two.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_33:
So...you really were plannin’ on givin’ me some
chocolates...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_34:
That’s too bad, huh. I know it’s disappointing not
to get a present...
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_35: Well...actually, I’ve gotten a present, haven’t I.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_36:
It’s not something I can eat, but I definitely felt
those feelings Marnie was sendin’ me.
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_37:
Y’know what? Me too! I’m just happy to know
how you feel, Marnie!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_38: Oh, cut it out. You’re embarrassin’ me!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_39:
I suppose our little mission to spread the thanks on
Palentine’s Day was a huge success!
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_41:
Why do I always hafta deal with these sweet,
softhearted feelings?
episode_event_chocolat_2022/4010_1001_43:
Your words are so sweet, they’ve even started to
melt my heart, Marnie.
